### Website URL
(e.g., https://example.com)

### Changes Implemented
Please describe how you have addressed the non-compliant patterns:
- [ ] Removed "Pay-or-Consent" wall.
- [ ] Added a "Reject All" button (equally as visible as "Accept All").
- [ ] Simplified the cookie management interface.

### Proof of Compliance
(Please provide a brief explanation or screenshots showing the new, compliant user journey).

### Acknowledgement
- [ ] I understand that if dark patterns are reintroduced in the future, this domain will be permanently blocked and added to the **Hall of Shame** without the possibility of a second appeal.
